text: Imi vanotenda! Kumbirai ruregerero kuna Allah zvakakwana! Pamwe Tenzi venyu vachakukanganwirai zvitadzo zvenyu, uye vachakupinzai mumapindu ayo pasi pawo pane nzizi dzinoyerera. Zuva iro Allah havazi kuzonyadzisa muporofita (Muhammad (SAW)) neavo vanotenda pamwe naye. Chiedza chavo chichimhanya mberi kwavo uye nekurudyi rwavo. Vachange vachiti: “Tenzi vedu! Zadzikisai chiedza chedu (kusvikira tayambuka As-Siraat (bhiriji riri pamusoro peGehena)) uye tiregerereiwo. Zvirokwazvo imi munokwanisa kuita zvose.”
